description:
This course will help you to shoot killer talking head videos. I will take you on this awsome journey, and teach you the insider's secrets I have discovered after almost 3 years of struggling to shoot videos.

This course will help you to shoot great talking head videos, to have self confidence and self esteem, and to tranform you from an introvert to an expert 'semi extrovert".

If you want your students to be delighted with your presentations, this is the right course, because I've been where you are now.

The course has 4 sections: each of them is intented to help different areas from your "on camera work".

I have discovered some little tricks that will help you in ways you can't imagine. So, let's get started!
title: Talk on Camera With Self Confidence and Humilate the TV Pros
